plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is animation. The user's favourite setting is likely a fictional one, as many of their favourite movies take place in fictional worlds. The user's favourite visual style is likely animated, as many of their favourite movies are animated. The user's favourite writing style is likely humorous, as many of their favourite movies have a humorous tone. The user's favourite runtime is likely under two hours, as many of their favourite movies have a runtime of under two hours. The user's favourite themes are likely adventure and comedy.
